description:
1. Frustrated with presenting? 
  2. Disappointed with PowerPoint? 
  3. Have something important to say...but can't seem to say it well? 
  4. Have a passion to communicate...but PowerPoint is getting in the way?

This is the course for you.

Based on thirty years of experience working with presentations and presenters around the world, this will teach you how to 

  1. Create clear content
  2. Design effective creative elements
  3. Use PowerPoint the right way
  4. Truly influence your audience

Learn a proven, simple, step by step system designed to make your presentations the best they can be. This is the course to help you use PowerPoint to become a world class presenter!
title: Look Here! Design PowerPoint Presentations Worth Watching
